org.smtlib

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smtlib.Utils
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Utils

    public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of static utility methods and constants for the SMT-LIB package.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Utils.SMTLIBException
      An Exception class used by the library

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILogic findLogic(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String path, IPos pos)
      Reads a logic file.
      ITheory findTheory(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String path)
      Reads a theory file, returning the S-expression that it holds.
      IResponse loadLogic(ILogic logic, SymbolTable symTable)
      This method must be overridden by a subclass to interpret the ILogic object according to the concrete syntax
      IResponse loadLogic(java.lang.String logicName, SymbolTable symTable, IPos pos)
      Finds and loads a logic into the given symbol table
      IResponse loadTheory(ITheory theory, SymbolTable symTable)
      This method must be overridden by a subclass to interpret the ITheory object according to the concrete syntax
      IResponse loadTheory(java.lang.String theoryName, SymbolTable symTable)
      Loads a theory into the given symbol table.
      static java.lang.String quote(java.lang.String msg)
      Quotes a string, adding enclosing quotes and putting in SMT-LIBv2 escapes as needed
      static java.lang.String unescape(java.lang.String msg)
      Converts a quoted string (which has enclosing double quotes) to a raw sequence of ASCII characters, undoing any SMT-LIBv2 escape sequences, and without the enclosing quotes

    • Method Detail

      • quote

        public static java.lang.String quote(java.lang.String msg)
        Quotes a string, adding enclosing quotes and putting in SMT-LIBv2 escapes as needed
        Parameters:
        msg - String to quote
        Returns:
        the quoted string

      • unescape

        public static java.lang.String unescape(java.lang.String msg)
        Converts a quoted string (which has enclosing double quotes) to a raw sequence of ASCII characters, undoing any SMT-LIBv2 escape sequences, and without the enclosing quotes

      • findLogic

        public ILogic findLogic(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String path,
               IPos pos)
                 throws Utils.SMTLIBException
        Reads a logic file.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the logic
        path - the directory in which logic files are stored
        Returns:
        an ISexpr that holds a logic definition
        Throws:
        Utils.SMTLIBException - if an error occurred

      • findTheory

        public ITheory findTheory(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String path)
                   throws Utils.SMTLIBException
        Reads a theory file, returning the S-expression that it holds.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the theory
        path - the directory path in which theory files are stored
        Returns:
        an ISexpr that holds a theory definition
        Throws:
        Utils.SMTLIBException - if an error occurs

      • loadLogic

        public IResponse loadLogic(java.lang.String logicName,
                  SymbolTable symTable,
                  IPos pos)
        Finds and loads a logic into the given symbol table
        Parameters:
        logicName - name of the logic to load
        symTable - the symbol table into which to load it
        Returns:
        null if read OK, an error if a problem happened

      • loadTheory

        public IResponse loadTheory(java.lang.String theoryName,
                   SymbolTable symTable)
        Loads a theory into the given symbol table.
        Parameters:
        theoryName - the theory to load
        symTable - the symbol table into which to put the theory
        Returns:
        null if OK, otherwise an error as a IResponse

      • loadLogic

        public IResponse loadLogic(ILogic logic,
                  SymbolTable symTable)
        This method must be overridden by a subclass to interpret the ILogic object according to the concrete syntax

      • loadTheory

        public IResponse loadTheory(ITheory theory,
                   SymbolTable symTable)
        This method must be overridden by a subclass to interpret the ITheory object according to the concrete syntax
